events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses. All initial forms are complete.
The loan application was categorised under Personal Loan as the request is related to medical costs.
Loan officer Sarah Kim has been assigned to manage the applicant’s personal loan, ensuring guidance throughout the process.
The initial review was conducted, confirming applicant’s eligibility and verifying submitted documents for completeness.
Additional medical bills and bank statements were requested to further evaluate the applicant’s financial needs.
The applicant submitted all requested medical invoices and recent bank statements promptly to support the loan request.
Credit history has been reviewed, showing a good credit score with no recent defaults or late payments.
Risk team completed the assessment considering the applicant’s financial situation and medical expense necessity.
A loan offer with favorable interest rates and ten-year repayment terms was presented to the applicant for consideration.
The applicant has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and requested minor clarifications on repayment flexibility.
Due to the applicant’s request for alternative repayment options, the case was escalated to the senior loan committee.
The senior loan committee approved the personal loan with adjusted repayment terms to accommodate the applicant’s needs.
The approved loan amount was successfully funded and transferred to the applicant’s account for medical expense coverage.
A follow-up call was completed to ensure the applicant understands the repayment schedule and is satisfied with the loan outcomes.
The loan application case was officially closed after confirming all procedures were completed and the applicant’s satisfaction.
